thread.title: Angel Sanchez / Alicia Sanchez
thread.title_full: ZipRecruiter reviewed by Angel Sanchez / Alicia Sanchez

author: Angel Sanchez / Alicia Sanchez
title: Angel Sanchez / Alicia Sanchez
text: "Liz" customer service representative she was great.!!!! Liz, was very helpful with obtaining new employees to our business. She explained how you can increase your search by using Travel Boost. Also she recommended using the Questions feature that allows you to ask a few questions to your job seekers before, so you can see if they are qualified for the position. "Thank you, Liz" and ZipRecruiter!!!
